conbody.p: The Nokia Converged Charging (NCC) Global Configuration Guide provides information about the configuration of managed elements, operators, roles, and system preferences. Included in this guide are some of the features found under the Common menu in the Policy and Charging GUI, such as the definition of units and conversions, configuration for external SPR, and mapping tables within the NCC solution on a global scale.
